title: VeloToze Roam latex shoe covers keep street & flat pedal shoes dry, are even walkable too!
content:
VeloToze’s new Roam shoe covers are a completely new take on the long-running fully-waterproof latex cycling shoe protection. Scaled up to fit on a wide range of casual street, boardroom-ready & even flat pedal cycling shoes, the new Roam covers are said to have reinforced, grippy soles that you can walk or pedal in, and […]

The post VeloToze Roam latex shoe covers keep street & flat pedal shoes dry, are even walkable too! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
